title: United States - lasting of love in a relationship in 2019
summary: This statistic shows a distribution of United , States lasting love times in the United Kingdom in 2019 .
According to Thinkbox and Ipsos , 77 % of respondents reported typically waking love at approximately 6 - 7am .
gold: This statistic shows the results of a survey conducted in the United States in 2019 on how long the respondents thought the feeling of love could last in a relationship.
According to 77 percent of respondents , the feeling of love in a relationship can last a lifetime .
